definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
China Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions (CAAPA)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 You2 yi4 ji1 You2 le4 yuan2 Xie2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中國遊藝機遊樂園協會

sentences.english: Huis Ten Boch is an amusement park near Nagasaki in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 豪斯登堡是位於日本長崎附近的遊樂園。

sentences.english: We eat lunch in Louisville, Kentucky, and then we go to amusement parks.
sentences.chinese: 我們在肯德基喫午飯，然後我們去遊樂園。

sentences.english: The miniature golf-Course is one of the most popular attractions at the amusement park.
sentences.chinese: 在遊樂園迷你高爾夫球是其中一種最普遍的景點之一。

sentences.english: There is also a science-themed amusement park nearby.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個以科學爲主題的遊樂園附近。

sentences.english: They have countless magic powers. At night witches can fly to their amusement park, riding a broom.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜女巫能夠騎着掃帚在天上飛，去到她們的遊樂園。

sentences.english: Qingyunshan folk custom amusement park has become the ideal world of Chinese and foreign tourists.
sentences.chinese: 青雲山民俗遊樂園已成爲中外遊客理想的天地。

sentences.english: For example, there's an amusement park in my dream world with some pretty cool rides.
sentences.chinese: 例如，在我的夢境中就有一個擁有很多酷車的遊樂園。

sentences.english: The offcial website has listed the price that offered in the amusement park.
sentences.chinese: 官方網站列出了遊樂園提供的食物價格。

sentences.english: Let's go to the Temple of Heaven and then play hide-and-seek in Beijing Amusement Park.
sentences.chinese: 我們先去天壇然後再去北京遊樂園玩捉迷藏遊戲吧。

sentences.english: Huwei Tai Sui struck, forcing all of the super amusement park in his work.
sentences.chinese: 虎威太歲來襲，強迫所有人在他的超級遊樂園中工作。

sentences.english: He proposed on the spot, against the twinkling lights of the 8)Coney Island amusement parks.
sentences.chinese: 在科尼島遊樂園閃爍的燈光下，他當場求婚。

sentences.english: That's right. And this amusement park really is coolsville. We won't be bored there.
sentences.chinese: 那這個遊樂園裏有什麼特別好玩的呢？

sentences.english: Throughout the park, signs are in Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 在遊樂園中，到處都可以看到中英文雙語標識。

sentences.english: A long palm tree-lined driveway leads to the park.
sentences.chinese: 一條兩邊栽滿棕櫚樹的道路通向遊樂園。

sentences.english: Inside the plane, it's a controlled amusement park ride.
sentences.chinese: 機艙是一個人工控制的遊樂園。

sentences.english: He proposed on the spot, against the twinkling lights of the Coney Island amusement parks.
sentences.chinese: 在科尼島遊樂園閃爍的燈光下，他當場求婚。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
merry-go-round/carousel/Carousel, South Korean TV soap opera
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
